name: Experience
description:
Master has orders, going down the mountain to practice, eliminating thieves and killing the people.
Then he set foot on the journey to eliminate thieves.

Equipment system

Equipment can be purchased at the store
No equipment, you can wear it if you buy it.
The more expensive the equipment, the better the performance.

Prop system

Props are mainly drugs
Can spend money at the store to buy
Restore HP after use
The more expensive the better the effect

Skill system

Through the upgrade, you can learn skills
Using skills can cause more damage
Use, need to consume a small amount of TP

Monster system

Walking around the map will trigger the battle
No fight will be triggered in the village
